name: rebrandly

description: Browse Rebrandly shortlinks, create new and delete old
author: grikomsn

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: Required API key to interact with Rebrandly

commands.name: rebrandly
commands.title: Browse Shortlinks
commands.subtitle: Rebrandly
commands.description: Browse Rebrandly shortlinks, create new and delete old

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
